data.name: Far-Out
data.detailed_description:
In this classic horror adventure you will follow the lone survivor of the Selene’s crew, geneticist Zack Paterson.
You have to find out what happened to the ship, the crew, and how to survive. Will you escape?

Features:
• Intense flexible and dynamic gameplay, resulting in 6 possible endings!
• Incredible music compositions that matches the intense gameplay!
• Immersive retrofuturistic environment.
• Any decisions may reduce your span of your life in the game.
• Control the ship with the Lira operating system.
• Old school adventure games meet new age mechanics and graphic fidelity.

...and dozens of other things that you'll have to discover on your own!

Developed by Alexander Hagelstein
Music by Michael Donner
Nic Mepham as Zack Paterson
data.about_the_game:
In this classic horror adventure you will follow the lone survivor of the Selene’s crew, geneticist Zack Paterson.
You have to find out what happened to the ship, the crew, and how to survive. Will you escape?

Features:
• Intense flexible and dynamic gameplay, resulting in 6 possible endings!

Developed by Alexander Hagelstein

data.short_description: "Far-Out" is a hardcore retrofuturistic adventure with dynamically changing gameplay and multiple endings. Made with the old-school quests such as The Dig, Space Quest, Full Throttle and Blade Runner in mind.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 - 64 bits
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800GTX / ATI Radeon HD 3xxx series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 - 64 bits
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M / Intel Iris Pro 5200 / Radeon HD 3xxx
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M / 9800GTX / Radeon HD 3xxx. OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850. OpenGL 4.x+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
